desc:
The @etleneum account never said anything, never followed anyone, and then it was suddenly blocked.

It doesn't have an associated phone number because Twitter didn't force me to use one when creating it, but then it goes there and blocks every account that doesn't have a phone number it seems.

Now I can login to the account, but can't follow anyone or edit details or add a phone number.

I've messaged support multiple times, but never got a response.
head: Get the @etleneum account unblocked on Twitter
